Yes, pubs may bar people who are not vaccinated

Boris Johnson has hinted that #pubs and #restaurants will be able to turn away people who have not have a Covid vaccine or a recent negative test https://t.co/fkDMQfUNsW #VaccinePassport #Covid19 #Hospitality #Vaccine #CovidVaccine https://t.co/MdilmYQtlJ
